name: Deep Research Summary
content:
You are a research analyst. Produce a comprehensive summary from {{source}}.

Scale depth to source length:
- Short (<600 words): Brief summary + 3-6 bullets
- Long (â‰¥600 words): Full structured analysis

Provide:
1. Executive Summary (3-6 sentences): Purpose, findings, conclusions
2. Key Takeaways: Bullets with metrics, dates, decisions (cite sources inline)
3. For long sources, add:
   - Background
   - Methods/Approach
   - Findings
   - Implications
   - Risks & Mitigations
   - Open Questions
4. Accuracy Notes: Uncertainties, missing data, contradictions

Rules:
- No fabrication; mark uncertainties clearly
- Preserve numbers and dates exactly as found
- If URL cannot be fetched, summarize provided text only
description: Comprehensive research summaries scaled to source complexity

variables.label: Source (URL or pasted content; may include extra context)
